content: happy little taco crochet pattern by melissa s crochet patterns you will need… ● yarn color a - red heart super saver solids in gold ● yarn color b - red heart super saver solids in coffee ● yarn color c - red heart super saver solids in spring green ● yarn color d - red heart super saver solids in cherry red ● black yarn for mouth ● 10mm safety eyes ● 3 25mm crochet hook size d ● fiberfill stuffing ● yarn needle ● sewing pins to hold pieces in place before sewing optional stitches and abbreviations used… ● chain - chain ● sl - slip_stitch ● single_crochet - single_crochet ● st - stitch ● sts - stitches ● repeat - repeat ● increase - increase 2 single_crochet in the same space ● decrease - decrease or decrease single_crochet 2 together taco ● using yarn color a round 1 ~ using a magic_ring place 6 single_crochet into the magic_ring 6 single_crochet round 2 ~ increase around 12 single_crochet round 3 ~ single_crochet increase / repeat around 18 single_crochet round 4 ~ single_crochet in 2 increase / repeat around 24 single_crochet round 5 ~ single_crochet in 3 increase / repeat around 30 single_crochet round 6 ~ single_crochet in 4 increase / repeat around 36 single_crochet round 7 ~ single_crochet in 5 increase / repeat around 42 single_crochet round 8 ~ single_crochet in 6 increase / repeat around 48 single_crochet round 9 ~ single_crochet in 7 increase / repeat around 54 single_crochet round 10 ~ single_crochet in 8 increase / repeat around 60 single_crochet ● change to yarn color b round 11 ~ in the back loop only - single_crochet around 60 single_crochet round 12 ~ back to both loops - single_crochet around 60 single_crochet ● change to yarn color c round 13 ~ in the front loops only - single_crochet increase with 2 double_crochet twice single_crochet 7 times single_crochet in 2 change to yarn color d - continuing in front loops only - sl twice increase with 2 half_double_crochet twice sl 6 times 42 in yarn color c and 36 in yarn color d fasten_off fold in half on the side with yarn color d - insert eyes between rnds 7 and 8 about 5 sts apart with yarn color b and a yarn needle sew the remaining loops from round 12 together before sewing all the way closed add stuffing with black yarn sew a mouth on your taco optional - with pink make-up blush or eyeshadow give your taco rosy cheeks i hope you enjoyed this crochet pattern if you have any questions feel free to contact me at any time please do not claim this pattern as your own i do not mind if you sell the finished product but do not sell this pattern as your own melissascrochetpatterns@gmail com ravelry ~ melissatrenado facebook ~ melissa s crochet patterns etsy shop ­ melissaspatterns
